content:
Summarize the following content in a bullet list Very briefly, why did you decide to back this project?
I want to get into woodwork but find most of the tools to expensive and take up too much space.

Home crafts
Its an interesting project with a lot of potential
Innovative product for small hobby/woodworking projects
I liked the multi-functionality

This is a very ingenious multifunctional toolkit for DIYers of smaller projects. The added bonus of it being portable makes it great to work on projects wherever you are.
Just what I needed. I want these tools for small projects and I don’t have much room to put them
small components for business
Im always interested in pairing down the amount of equipment I keep at home. This seemed like a great product to try to streamline my tool storage.
Looked like a great set of tools to help with crafts
Looks useful.
I enjoy crafting small objects, and I like the idea of having all tools in one area with the same system
I make small wood projects. This looks like a great toolkit for that!
I have limited space and most of my projects have a smaller scale.
Im an artist who works 3-D increasingly.
Looking for something compact/multi use for any project
Versatile, gives me the tools for a few projects I had put on hold. Affordable
I want to do some projects and it will fit with my projects
Very useful for our hobby projects
I am a product designer and thought that this product will help me with my work.
Looked neat
Interesting idea
My son makes a lot of models. This will help

fun to create
Design and usability of the product
The size of this kit will be super handy when doing projects with my small children.
Looks like a handy way to do some fun crafts.
Looks like it will be helpful with my hobbies
Convenient tool kit for projects.
Interesting concept multi tool
I think it will be an awesome gift for my dad.
Es sieht nach einem sehr durchdachten Projekt aus. Ich werde dann meine vielen verschiedenen Minigeräte fest im Schrank verschließen können. Vll. noch als Reserve halten, falls euer Gerät irgendwann eine Reparatur benötigt.
I enjoy craft projects and your invention seems it may be helpful in my workshop
I love to make small objects with wood
3D Print Finishing
Interesting product
Want to use the tools
Serves my need
Looked like an interesting project
Looks like a kit with tools Ive been meaning to buy all in one place
The Doer is great and I can use a smaller, lightweight version for smaller projects
Functional
I have the Doer, it only made sense
due to all the functionality and price compared to other brands like dremel
I like the compact storage of multiple, useful tools
I wanted to invent something similar
It seems like a useful tool for me
It will be very handy in my project shop
I worked in engineering and do home projects
Its what Im searcing for.
I use a lot of these sorts of tools, and would use more if I had them
looked like nice powertool collection
Looked cool

Fill a niche in needing a fabrication / cleanup platform for some of my projects
Looks like a great little tool set that I can use for small projects.
Useful
meets a current need
wanted a cutting / drilling tool for small DIY project
Having the option to create small items
A great concept
already thinking about buying several of the tool capabilities featured in the DaVinci
The multi-tool arrangement provides a compact, efficient system for small hobby projects, without the need for a full shop. Great for a one-bench space in the garage.
Portability and the craft work use case for the tool
Fits my needs
It seems perfect for the crafting I do
Innovative
I have a potential use for this equipment
Small and flex tools
I love crafting
I want to get this as a gift for my husband
I do a lot of building small projects and this will be perfect, with only one box to transport if needed.
Seems like it would be a useful tool for small crafts and miniatures.
Looks like a good deal and your past projects have funded well.
It looks like an amazing tool set I can use
All in one some tools I want
It looks interesting
I backed your first project and I think this will make a nice addition to my collection of tools
It looks cool!
It looks incredibly useful for my day-to-day projects.
I am enthusiastic about DOER and your new product will be just as great.
Liked the DOER. Hope this is of good quality. Price seemed a bit high, but am hopeful.
I like the compact form of the tools that fits my needs.
relatively good experience with DOER (also they still did not deliver all parts that I was ordering). Useful tools with excellent quality, all are using one 20V system,.
I love the technology and how it all works together.
Seems like a very nice small setup for hobbyist activities
Doer backer
For a small project I’ve had for a while….I don’t need full size wood working tools for. This size is perfect for my project.
I need many of these tools
need many tools to fit in a small space
like crafting and my husbands does wood models
Looked handy
i have seen your last project, and didnt back it... but now this project is perfect for me as Im an industrial designer and innovation manager, it would be a great tool for my workshop!!!
Replaces a bunch of separate, non-portable tools
I build models. This looks like a great tool for doing small work.
I’m itching to start some projects with soapstone and this unit is so portable. I like that it works with our Doer as well.
Modeller
I have many woodworking tools, but having an all in one toolbox wad very appealing to me for small projects and being able to have it anywhere I need is a plus.
Model hobbies
I like useful compact tools
Im a DIYer and hobbyist. I often have need to cut smaller things so using a table saw is overkill. This kit is perfect (and portable). From watching everything it can do this was meticulous thought out and designed.
Extremely practical idea that will be useful for me in the future
I love tools!
I do lots of projects with power tools

What can Ibsay, seems like a dream toolbox !
Compact and versatility
It looks like a useful product for my own use.
Versatility
I like power tools designed for small scale projects.
looking for compact tool kit
Intressting product - innovative workbench included
Is a nice idea!
I have a variety of hobbies and dont always have the tools I need, this looks like it should cover that.
I do many 3d printer projects
Very unique design
Tools for modeling and small projects
Looks like a good product for my various hobbies
DIY enthusiast
Seems like a nice bit if kit for someone into 3d printing
To have similar capabilities in remote Light EV repair that we have in brick & mortar workshop
Small and portability
Im going to be actually able to lift and carry it(yay!). Has the tools necessary for a number of projects.
Seems like it would be useful in my and my wifes hobbies

I always wanted to have a table saw and a lathe.

I looks like it would be a nice addition to my laser cutter crafting
Its seems very convenient and something i was actually looking for
This will be a very useful toolbox
need for craft work. compact and hopefully simple to use.
I wanted a tool kit for when I get a house, plus a Dremel for cosplay props
Interested on your latest innovative product
If it arrives in August, then it will make for a good birthday present
Liked the versatility of the project
Interesting idea
The project is very interesting
I love DIY. I have s lot of tools. I have a dremmel, and I have used a lot. I need tools for little details
Cool product
Unique combination of tools that allow precision and flexibility
I want the capability of this product
I am a teacher in France. It could be useful for my students.
uni tools
Now I can have my own lathe.
The project seems useful
Want a small but complete set of tools for hobbies.
Bc it reminds me of a Dremel on steroids and Im intrigued
Work
Because I did
we are a crafting family, got them for my family

all-in-one design
.....
Looks like a great idea
I like craftmanship work
I work in engineering and in my spare time i work on home projects
I love DIY but I dont have much space
I thought it might be useful for smaller projects
Very possible and good to have a small work bench so that I dont have to commit for multiple bigger pieces
im working on a project that wouldve been 100% easier had I had this tool! I wish i could buy it NOW
Keen to get the tools, and this is a complete compact solution
Im a model hobbyest and miniature painter and the tools will help make those activities more fun and easier.
Looks awesome.
looked cool and useful
Nice idea
Something I can use
Because it combines all the tools I need for my projects.
The all in one tool fitted in a single box
Concept

The multitude of tasks possible with it
Looks solid for projects at home
Perfect hobbyist platform
Should help me combine many tools allowing me to create some more space in my garage
Interesting product. Since you had already a project on Kickstarter it seems to reliable.
My wife was looking for something like this for her crafts and 3D printing hobby.
Husband gift
Very convenient tool package for hobbies when travelling in motorhome. Limited space for tools in the house - they live in a shed outdoors and Canadian winters means I cant use them outside. This will be perfect for hobby projects inside.
because I believe in it!!!!
Gift for my Boyfriend 💖
The usefulness of smaller and portable versions of bigger power tools for hobby applications.
My son and I enjoy crafting projects together, and I also like to back innovative projects.
very interesting device
I like to build small projects as a hobby
The product
Thanks
Works well for making tiny things
looks like a useful tool

its an interesting project
It looks awesome and has most of everything I need in one tiny package!
variety of tools for miniature figures and 3d prints
I really need this miracle 🙂
Design

Has everything a craft hobbyist can use
All in one cool gadgetry
Downsizing and must give up larger tools,
This set of tools would help a lot in my craft projects.
Like

Crafting projects

need the product

good concept for mobile projects

Looks interesting

Interesting idea!

Looking forward to using it to create small projects with precision and portability.
I am a maker and this seems like a great toolset and workflow for some of my projects
Main reason I dont have power tools myself is because of how much space they would take up, this seems like a good option for me
